recovery.title: Recovery Manual
recovery.subtitle: Step-by-step guide to recover your code and data in any emergency
recovery.maintenance_notice: This manual is updated monthly with current images and content
recovery.verify_step_2: Click the GitHub button in the top right
recovery.verify_step_3: If it says 'Connected to [repo-name]' → ✅ You're connected correctly
recovery.verify_step_4: If it says 'Connect to GitHub' → ⚠️ You need to connect
recovery.scenario_1_desc: If you lost access to Lovable or the project disappeared
recovery.step_1_desc: Open your browser and go to
recovery.step_2_desc: On the GitHub homepage, search for your project repository.
recovery.personal_repo_title: If the repository was in your personal account
recovery.org_repo_title: If the repository is in an organization
recovery.org_repo_desc_1: Click on your profile picture (top right)
recovery.step_3_desc: Inside the repository, click the green button
recovery.option_a_desc: Download a .zip file with all the code. Extract it on your computer.
recovery.option_b_desc: Copy the URL and use Git on your computer (requires technical knowledge)
recovery.step_4_desc: Now that you have the code, you can deploy it on any hosting:
recovery.deploy_option_1_step_5: Done! Your site will be online in 2 minutes
recovery.deploy_option_3_step_1: Create a new project in Lovable
recovery.deploy_option_3_step_3: Lovable will sync all the code
recovery.deploy_option_3_step_4: You can continue editing from where you left off
recovery.scenario_2_title: Scenario 2: I Moved the Repo to an Organization
recovery.scenario_2_desc: The project disappeared from Lovable after moving the repository
recovery.what_happened_desc: When you move a repository from your personal account to an organization on GitHub, Lovable loses the connection because the repository URL changed.
recovery.dont_panic_desc_1: ✅ Your code is 100% safe on GitHub
recovery.dont_panic_desc_3: ✅ You just need to reconnect Lovable
recovery.verify_org_title: Verify the repo is in the organization
recovery.verify_org_step_1: Click on your profile picture → 'Your organizations'
recovery.verify_org_step_3: Find the repository → It should be there
recovery.reconnect_option_a_step_2: Then click GitHub → Connect to GitHub
recovery.reconnect_option_b_title: Option B: Create new project and connect
recovery.reconnect_option_b_step_1: Create a new project in Lovable
recovery.reconnect_option_b_step_5: Lovable will sync all the code automatically
recovery.backup_step_1_desc: In the admin panel, go to System Backups
recovery.backup_step_2_title: Find the backup you want to restore
recovery.backup_step_2_desc: Backups are ordered by date. Choose the most recent one.
recovery.backup_step_3_desc: Confirm the restoration and wait for the process to complete.
recovery.important_desc: Restoration only recovers data (products, orders, users). It does NOT recover the application code.
recovery.prevention_desc: Follow these steps to always be protected:
recovery.prevention_1: Connect your project to GitHub (5 minutes)
recovery.prevention_4: Create a manual backup before major changes
recovery.problem_1_title: "I don't see my repository on GitHub"
recovery.problem_1_solution_1: Verify you're logged in with the correct account
recovery.problem_1_solution_2: If it's in an organization, check the 'Your organizations' section
recovery.problem_2_solution_2: Reconnect from Lovable with all permissions
recovery.problem_3_title: "My code is on GitHub but the app doesn't work"
recovery.problem_3_solution: GitHub only stores code, not the database. Restore data from a backup (Scenario 3).
recovery.faq_q1: How often is code synced to GitHub?
recovery.faq_a1: Every time Lovable saves changes, it syncs automatically in real-time.
recovery.faq_a2: Yes, you can configure automatic daily, weekly backups and create manual backups whenever you want.
recovery.faq_q3: What happens if I delete something by mistake?
recovery.faq_a3: You can restore from a backup or use GitHub's version history.
recovery.faq_q4: Do backups include images and files?
recovery.faq_a4: Yes, backups include the entire database, including references to stored files.
recovery.external_access_desc: This manual is publicly available in your GitHub repository. Save this URL in a safe place:

refer_earn.three_steps: Three simple steps to start earning
refer_earn.share_desc: Send your unique link to friends and family. It's quick and easy.
refer_earn.they_buy_desc: Your friends use your link and make their first purchase on Wincova.
refer_earn.you_earn_desc: You receive points for every purchase they make. Everyone wins.
refer_earn.share_with_friends: You can share it with your friends now
refer_earn.benefits_subtitle: Everything you need to know about our rewards
refer_earn.benefit_unlimited_desc: There's no limit to how much you can earn. The more you share, the more you earn.
refer_earn.benefit_instant_desc: Points are credited instantly after each successful purchase.
refer_earn.benefit_easy_desc: Just share your link. No complications or complex requirements.
refer_earn.benefit_realtime_desc: See your updated stats in real time from your dashboard.

rewards_terms.title: Rewards Program
rewards_terms.subtitle: Every purchase counts. Every action adds up. Start earning today!
rewards_terms.what_is_description: Wincova's Rewards Program is a benefit system designed to reward your purchases and community participation. For every valid action you take, you earn points that you can use to pay for part of your future purchases.
rewards_terms.more_you_participate: The more you participate, the more you earn!
rewards_terms.how_to_earn_description: You earn points when you shop, refer friends, leave reviews, follow us on social media, or subscribe.
rewards_terms.examples_title: Examples of how to earn points:
rewards_terms.how_to_use_title: How do I use my points?
rewards_terms.how_to_use_description: Your accumulated points can be applied to the payment of your purchases during the checkout process.
rewards_terms.cancel_return_title: What happens if I cancel or return a purchase?
rewards_terms.cancel_return_description: If you return a product, the points earned from that purchase will also be cancelled.
rewards_terms.share_rewards_description: No, points are not transferable. They are your personal reward for trusting us.
rewards_terms.expiration_description: Points expire 12 months after earning them.
rewards_terms.where_to_see_title: Where can I see my accumulated rewards?
rewards_terms.where_to_see_description: You can view your accumulated rewards by logging into your account and clicking on "My Profile".
rewards_terms.restrictions_title: Are there restrictions on using points?
rewards_terms.restrictions_description: Points can be used on most of our products, but there are some exceptions
rewards_terms.terms_change_title: Can Wincova change the program terms?
rewards_terms.terms_change_description: Yes, we can update the rules to improve the system.
rewards_terms.suspension_description: Wincova reserves the right to suspend or terminate any user's participation in the program who attempts to manipulate or defraud the system.
